summary: A troubled town is having an Indian casino built on a historic battlefield. Chase, working at the town museum, opposes it. He meets the cute Lucy. They start a petition against the casino.
cast: Justin Long|Emmanuelle Chriqui|Rob Corddry|Keir O'Donnell|Missi Pyle|David Jensen|Jimmi Simpson|Nick Offerman|Brian Howe|Phil Reeves|Robert Beltran|Kimberly Guerrero|Martin Beck|Stephanie Ellis Bratton|Kendrick Cross|Michelle Dawkins|Jacob Dietrich|Vickie Eng|Will Finch|Brett Gentile|Bridget Gethins|Linwood Gurley|Michael Harding|Tamara Hopkins|Brian Huskey|Andrew James|Jim Keisler|Bill Ladd|Danielle Langlois|Tyler Long|Robin Mullins|Brandon Oakes|Peggy Obrien|Michele Seidman|Lauren Carol Smith|Jessica St. Clair|Matthew Stanton|Phillip Stilwell|Zoe Stilwell|Frank Hoyt Taylor|Pat Yeary|David Lowe|Sabrina Hunter Morales|Mark Alton Rose
title: Taking Chances
